description: This file defines mock data for a food delivery app, including lists of restaurants, categories, and a method to generate menu items per restaurant. It serves as a local in-memory data source for testing or demo purposes.

methods.name: menuForRestaurant
methods.description: Generates a list of sample menu items for a given restaurant ID, including various categories like popular items, starters, mains, combos, desserts, and drinks, with predefined options, variants, and add-ons.

methods.name: restaurantById
methods.description: Retrieves a Restaurant object by its ID from the mock restaurants list.
